John Biewen, director of the audio program at the Center for Documentary Studies at Duke University, recently edited Reality Radio: Telling True Stories in Sound, a book of essays by leading audio documentary makers.

title: John Biewen
description: John Biewen, director of the audio program at the Center for Documentary Studies at Duke University, recently edited Reality Radio: […]
contentencoded: John Biewen, director of the audio program at the Center for Documentary Studies at Duke University, recently edited Reality Radio: Telling True Stories in Sound, a book of essays by leading audio documentary makers.
